2.Text: A little dwarf with a big knife blocks your way.

3.Text: A little dwarf just walked around a corner, saw you, threw a little axe at you which missed, cursed, and ran away.

4.Text: There is a threatening little dwarf in the room with you!

5.Text: One sharp nasty knife is thrown at you!

9.Text: There is no way to go that direction.

10.Text: I am unsure how you are facing. Use compass points or nearby objects.

11.Text: I don't know in from out here. Use compass points or name something in the general direction you want to go.

12.Text: I don't know how to apply that word here.

14.Text: I'm game. Would you care to explain how?

15.Text: Sorry but I am not allowed to give more detail. I will repeat the long description of your location.

16.Text: It is now pitch dark. If you proceed you will likely fall into a pit.
